entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why is Package Manager trying to suggest incompatible updates? #33135
  • Cosmos - Inheritance through abstract class fails to load when searching by Find or through explicit load statements #33134
  • SQLite Error 5: 'database is locked'. - Is this Sqlite error code 5 (busy) or 6 (locked)? What causes it? #33133
  • Adjust DB context generation from DB #33131
  • Migrations command in incorrect order when dealing with sequences #33130
  • Exception when using ComplexProperty on entity that's mapped to a Table-Valued function or a View #33129

Closed

  • An issue with EF Core Recursive Updates on Unchanged Entities across Different DbContext Instances #33122
  • Q: HasConversion Overloads and confusing behavior #33102
  • dotnet ef tools 8.0.2 not compatible with .Net SDK 8.0.101? #33092
  • Docker + "The FrameworkReference 'Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App.WindowsForms' was not recognized" on v8.0.2 #33088
  • Access to a collection on an entity in Added state with lazy loading enabled #33079
  • Polymorph entity (TPH) with select-mapping and FirstOrDefault - could not be translated #33069
  • EF Core 8.0.1 regression: an entity with a primary key in another collation returns invalid results for trivial queries. #33040
  • Owned type's shadow key size should match that of owner's PK #33037
  • Ignored/Removed Indexes are still created in GenerateCreateScript #33007
  • Entity Framework Core in Visual Studio 2022 Migrations freezes (hangs) during migrations (example Add-Migration) #32998
  • Ephemeral/Shadow navigation properties or other mechanism of automatic joins. #32658
  • Migrate separate Sqlite in-memory database fails #33128

PullRequests

Created

  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33132

Updated

  • Rewrite the funcletizer to support precompiled queries #33106
